name: USCoreProcedureCodes
title: US Core Procedure Codes
description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the type of procedure: a specific code indicating type of procedure performed, from CPT, SNOMED CT, or HCPCS Level II Alphanumeric Codes.
